p.codeblock: virtual int playAllEffects(int loopCount, double pitch, double pan, int gain, bool publish = false) = 0;
public abstract int playAllEffects(int loopCount, double pitch, double pan, double gain, boolean publish);

section.p: After preloading multiple audio effect files into memory by calling multiple times, you can call this method to play all loaded audio effects for all users in the channel.
After preloading multiple sound effects into memory using preloadEffect, you can call this method to play all preloaded sound effects for all users in the channel.

plentry.pd:
The number of times the audio effect loops:
-1: Loops indefinitely until or is called.
0: Plays once.
1: Plays twice.
The pitch of the audio effect. The range is [0.5, 2.0], and the default is 1.0 (original pitch). The smaller the value, the lower the pitch.

The spatial position of the audio effect. The range is [-1.0, 1.0]:
-1.0: The audio effect appears on the left.
0: The audio effect appears in the center.
1.0: The audio effect appears on the right.
The volume of the audio effect. The range is [0, 100], and the default is 100 (original volume). The smaller the value, the lower the volume.

Whether to publish the audio effect to remote users:
: Publishes the audio effect to remote users. Both local and remote users can hear it.
: (Default) Does not publish the audio effect. Only the local user can hear it.

The number of times the sound effect loops:
-1: Loops indefinitely until or is called.
0: Plays the sound effect once.
1: Plays the sound effect twice.
The pitch of the sound effect. The range is [0.5, 2.0], with a default value of 1.0 (original pitch). Lower values indicate lower pitch.

The spatial position of the sound effect. The range is [-1.0, 1.0]:
-1.0: Plays from the left.
0.0: Plays from the center.
1.0: Plays from the right.
The volume of the sound effect. The range is [0, 100], with a default value of 100 (original volume). Lower values indicate lower volume.

Whether to publish the sound effect to remote users:
: Publishes the sound effect to remote users. Both local and remote users can hear it.
: (Default) Does not publish the sound effect. Only the local user can hear it.
